66f9a6585e5b2d67ba607c5698ded203cee888fb.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to 8... | tools:11

response.content: "Oh, it's a busy day as always—good ale flows and a few new faces are trying the stew. We’ve just started a special night ale tonight, so the tavern’s humming nicely. How can I help you today?
